channel.title: Npc attack gfx? and walking gfx?
channel.description: ok when i attack a npc it turns all to mush and hits right well how do i make it so they look normal ?

item.title: Npc attack gfx? and walking gfx?

item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Search this for Attack Anim

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType ==

Then change that NPC Id of an NPC that you don’t use to the one you want to have Animations, or just Copy one above, paste it, then Edit it.

Search this for Block Anim

} else if (npcs[i].npcType ==

Then do the same as for attack.

item.title: Npc attack gfx? and walking gfx?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

In Npchandler.java add these:

Attack Anim

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == NPCID) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = ANIMID;

Block Anim

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { npcs[i].animNumber = ANIMID;

Search Animation ID’s on google.

Read full topic
